text: Salvation for All Who Obey
Thus says Yahweh:
“Observe justice
and do righteousness,
for my salvation \add is\add* close to coming,
and my justice to being revealed.
Happy \add is the\add* man \add who\add* does this,
and \add the\add* son of humankind \add who\add* keeps hold of it,
who keeps \add the\add* Sabbath ⸤so as not to profane⸥\f + \fr 56:2 \ft Literally “from profaning” \f* it,
and who keeps his hand from doing any\f + \fr 56:2 \ft Or “all” \f* evil.”
And do not let the ⸤foreigner⸥\f + \fr 56:3 \ft Literally “son of the foreign country” \f* \add who\add* joins himself to Yahweh say, “Surely Yahweh will separate me from his people.”
And do not let the eunuch say, “Look! I \add am\add* a dry tree!”
For thus says Yahweh, “To the eunuchs who keep my Sabbaths,
and choose that in which I delight,
and who keep hold of my covenant.
And I will give them a monument and a name in my house and within my walls,
better than sons and daughters;
I will give him an everlasting name
that shall not be cut off.
And the ⸤foreigners⸥\f + \fr 56:6 \ft Literally “sons of the foreign country” \f* \add who\add* join themselves to Yahweh to serve him
and to love the name of Yahweh, to become his servants,
every one who keeps \add the\add* Sabbath, ⸤so as not to profane⸥\f + \fr 56:6 \ft Literally “from profaning” \f* it,
and those who keep hold of my covenant,
I will bring them to ⸤my holy mountain⸥;\f + \fr 56:7 \ft Literally “the mountain of my holiness” \f*
I will make them merry in my house of prayer.
their burnt offerings and their sacrifices ⸤will be accepted⸥\f + \fr 56:7 \ft Literally “for acceptance” \f* on my altar,
for my house shall be called a house of prayer for all peoples,”

⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 56:8 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* the Lord Yahweh, who gathers\f + \fr 56:8 \ft Or “gathering” \f* the scattered ones of Israel (still I will gather to\f + \fr 56:8 \ft Or “upon” \f* him, to his gathered ones).
Wicked Leaders
All wild animals \add in the\add* field, come,
to devour,\f + \fr 56:9 \ft Or “eat” \f* all wild animals in the forest!
His watchmen \add are\add* blind,
none of them know.
They \add are\add* all dumb dogs;
they are unable to bark,
panting, lying down,
loving to slumber.
And the dogs ⸤have a greedy appetite⸥;\f + \fr 56:11 \ft Literally “are strong of soul” \f*
they ⸤are never satisfied⸥.\f + \fr 56:11 \ft Literally “do not know satiation” \f*
And they are \add the\add* shepherds!
They do not have\f + \fr 56:11 \ft Or “know” \f* understanding.
They all turn to their \add own\add* way,
each one for his \add own\add* gain, ⸤every one of them⸥.\f + \fr 56:11 \ft Literally “from his end “ \f*
“Come, let me take wine,
and let us carouse \add with\add* intoxicating drink,
and tomorrow will be like today,
⸤very great indeed⸥.”\f + \fr 56:12 \ft Literally “excessively” \f*
